summary: A commandâ€‘line utility that transforms CogVideoX model checkpoints into the Hugging Face Diffusers format by loading the original state dict, renaming and remapping transformer and VAE parameter keys, and saving the converted model for downstream video generation pipelines.
business_intent: Enable developers to migrate existing CogVideoX checkpoints to the Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying deployment, inference, and integration of video generation models within Hugging Face infrastructure.
